1083385061972627456.text: Do you need help with a federal agency? If you can’t get an answer from a federal agency in a timely fashion, or feel that you have been treated unfairly, my office may be able to help. https://t.co/iPZwsFKLgs

1082782092650602496.text: The absence of strong border security encourages illegal immigration, human trafficking, & the spread of illicit drugs. As a law enforcement officer of 23 yrs, I know that Minnesotans want a nation of law and order. It is time to secure our border & keep the American people safe.

1082422483737894916.text: It's not right for members of Congress to be paid while parts of the federal government remain shut down. Rather than sending my pay back to the federal government, Jodi & I have decided to give this money to those who need it most. https://t.co/ZEp16OjKUv
